name: Manufacturing Tourism Integration
description: WebWaka Manufacturing-Tourism Integration Agent (Agent 15) Cross-Sector Artisan Tourism and Cultural Craft Experiences  This agent provides comprehensive integration between manufacturing and tourism with: - Artisan tourism and craft experience development - Traditional manufacturing tourism integration - Cultural craft workshop and demonstration programs - Manufacturing heritage site tourism development - Community-based artisan and tourism cooperatives - Mobile-first interfaces optimized for African connectivity - Voice-first commands in 14+ African languages - Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-based development
